name: Quick and Easy Monkey Bread
author: MARBALET
summary: This is a very easy bread to make.  Monkey bread also has been called Bubble Bread and Pull Apart Bread.
ingredients: 1 (3.4 ounce) package instant butterscotch pudding mix
directions: The night or several hours before, grease and flour a 9 or 10 inch tube pan
Mix brown sugar and pudding mix together
Mix white sugar and cinnamon together
Place frozen dinner rolls in pan a layer at a time
Sprinkle brown sugar and pudding mix over first layer of rolls
Sprinkle sugar and cinnamon mixture over the brown sugar and  pudding mixture
Spread half the nuts and melted butter over first layer
Next morning bake in a preheated 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) oven for 30 minutes
Let stand a few minutes and turn pan over onto serving platter
